i'm having trouble playing this game. At first it says i am missing mss32.dll . After looking online and installing mss32.dll into the games root directory i get the error "The procedure entry point _AIL_set_sample_volume@8 could not be located in the dynamic link library mss32.dll"  i tried all the different versions i could find of mss32.dll.  I also tried placing the file into system/32 with no luck. Any help would be great. I'm really looking forward to playing this game. Thanks
